mapper.insert:
/* insSubjectInfo */ INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT ( BUSN_CLASS, BUSN_NM, PJT_STEP, PJT_STEP_NM, BS_TITLE, YEAR_CLASS, SBJ_CLASS, SBJ_CHAR, SBJ_DEP, SBJ_DEP_SUB, SBJ_STAT_YN, STR_DT, END_DT, EMP_SEQ, EMP_NAME, DEPT_SEQ, DEPT_NAME, PJT_NM, CRM_SN, CRM_CON_SN, CRM_PART_SN, PJT_EXP_AMT, ALL_BUSN_COST, SECURITY, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{busnClass}, #{busnNm}, #{pjtStep}, #{pjtStepNm}, #{bsTitle}, #{yearClass}, #{sbjClass}, #{sbjChar}, #{sbjDep}, #{sbjDepSub}, #{sbjStatYn}, #{strDt}, #{endDt}, #{empSeq}, #{empName}, #{deptSeq}, #{deptName}, #{pjtNm}, #{crmSn}, #{crmConSn}, #{crmPartSn}, #{pjtExpAmt}, #{allBusnCost}, #{security}, #{regEmpSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_PJT_MNG' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_PROJECT'
mapper.update: /*updSubjectInfo*/ UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT SET BS_TITLE = #{bsTitle}, YEAR_CLASS = #{yearClass}, SBJ_CLASS = #{sbjClass}, SBJ_CHAR = #{sbjChar}, SBJ_DEP = #{sbjDep}, SBJ_DEP_SUB = #{sbjDepSub}, SBJ_STAT_YN = #{sbjStatYn}, STR_DT = #{strDt}, END_DT = #{endDt}, EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, EMP_NAME = #{empName}, DEPT_SEQ = #{deptSeq}, DEPT_NAME = #{deptName}, PJT_NM = #{pjtNm}, CRM_SN = #{crmSn}, CRM_CON_SN = #{crmConSn}, CRM_PART_SN = #{crmPartSn}, ALL_BUSN_COST = #{allBusnCost}, SECURITY = #{security}, PJT_EXP_AMT = #{pjtExpAmt} WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}
mapper.insert:
/* insAccountInfo */ INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_ACCOUNT ( PJT_SN, BUSN_CLASS, BUSN_NM, IS_TYPE, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES
( #{pjtSn}, #{busnClass}, #{busnNm}, #{item.value}, #{regEmpSeq} )

/*insPjtRschData*/ INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_RSCH ( PJT_SN, PJT_RSCH_EMP_SEQ, PJT_RSCH_COMP, PJT_RSCH_NM, PJT_RSCH_POSITION,
PJT_MNG_CHECK, REAL_YN,
REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{pjtSn}, #{EMP_SEQ}, '캠틱', #{EMP_NAME_KR}, '연구원',
#{mngCheck}, 'Y',
#{regEmpSeq} )
mapper.select: /*getRschCount*/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_RSCH WHERE PJT_RSCH_EMP_SEQ = #{EMP_SEQ}

/*getRndDevScheduleList*/ SELECT A.*, B.*, C.file_org_name, C.file_ext FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DEV_SCH A LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO B ON A.REG_EMP_SEQ = B.EMP_SEQ LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO C ON A.DEV_SCH_SN = C.CONTENT_ID AND C.FILE_CD = 'devSchJob' WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} ORDER BY A.DEV_SCH_CD
mapper.insert: /*insDevSchData*/ INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DEV_SCH ( PJT_SN, DEV_SCH_CD, DEV_SCH_NM, SCH_STR_DE, DEV_SCH_ETC, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUE ( #{pjtSn}, #{devSchCd}, #{devSchNm}, #{schStrDe}, #{devSchEtc}, #{empSeq} )
mapper.select: /*getRndDevJobList*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DEV_SCH A LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO B ON A.REG_EMP_SEQ = B.EMP_SEQ WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} AND SCH_END_DE IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DEV_SCH WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} AND DEV_SCH_CD = #{devSchCd}
/*getDevSchInfo*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_DEV_SCH A LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO B ON A.DEV_SCH_SN = B.CONTENT_ID AND B.FILE_CD = #{devSchJob} WHERE A.DEV_SCH_SN = #{devSchSn}

/*getRndDetail*/ SELECT A.*, B.*, DI.APPRO_KEY, DI.DOC_MENU_CD FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_RND A LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO B ON A.RND_FILE_SN = B.file_no LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO DI ON A.DOC_ID = DI.DOC_ID WHERE A.PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}
mapper.insert:
/*insRndDetail*/ INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_RND ( PJT_SN, MNG_DEPT_SEQ, MNG_DEPT_NAME, MNG_EMP_SEQ, MNG_EMP_NAME, ALL_RES_COST, ALL_BUSN_COST, PEO_RES_COST, PEO_RES_ITEM, TOT_RES_COST, RND_OBJ, RND_ETC, DELV_DAY, NOW_STR_DE, NOW_END_DE, RES_DAY ) VALUE ( #{pjtSn}, #{mngDeptSeq}, #{mngDeptName}, #{mngEmpSeq}, #{mngEmpName}, #{allResCost}, #{allBusnCost}, #{peoResCost}, #{peoResItem}, #{totResCost}, #{rndObj}, #{rndEtc}, #{delvDay}, #{nowStrDe}, #{nowEndDe}, #{resDay} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_PJT_MNG' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_PJT_RND'

/*insRndDetail2*/ INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_RND ( PJT_SN, MNG_DEPT_SEQ, MNG_DEPT_NAME, MNG_EMP_SEQ, MNG_EMP_NAME ) VALUE ( #{pjtSn}, #{mngDeptSeq}, #{mngDeptName}, #{mngEmpSeq}, #{mngEmpName} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_PJT_MNG' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_PJT_RND'
mapper.update: /*updRndDetail*/ UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_RND SET MNG_DEPT_SEQ = #{mngDeptSeq}, MNG_DEPT_NAME = #{mngDeptName}, MNG_EMP_SEQ = #{mngEmpSeq}, MNG_EMP_NAME = #{mngEmpName}, BANK_NO = #{bankNo}, ACC_HOLD = #{accHold}, ALL_BUSN_COST = #{allBusnCost}, ALL_RES_COST = #{allResCost}, PEO_RES_COST = #{peoResCost}, PEO_RES_ITEM = #{peoResItem}, TOT_RES_COST = #{totResCost}, RES_CARD_CHECK = #{resCardCheck}, RES_CARD_NO = #{resCardNo}, RND_OBJ = #{rndObj}, RND_ETC = #{rndEtc}, DELV_DAY = #{delvDay}, NOW_STR_DE = #{nowStrDe}, NOW_END_DE = #{nowEndDe}, RES_DAY = #{resDay} WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}

/*updRndTotResCost*/ UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_RND SET TOT_RES_COST = (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(CB_BUDGET), 0) AS TOTAL_AMT FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_CB WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} AND ( ACCOUNT IN (SELECT IS_TYPE FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_ACCOUNT SSA WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}) OR ACCOUNT = CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(IS_TYPE) FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_ACCOUNT SSA WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} AND IS_TYPE = '9') = 1 THEN '6' ELSE NULL END)),
PEO_RES_COST = (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(CB_BUDGET), 0) AS TOTAL_AMT FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_CB WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} AND ( ACCOUNT IN (SELECT IS_TYPE FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_ACCOUNT SSA WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}) OR ACCOUNT = CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(IS_TYPE) FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_ACCOUNT SSA WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} AND IS_TYPE = '9') = 1 THEN '6' ELSE NULL END)) WHERE RND_SN = #{rndSn}

/*updRndProjectInfo*/ UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT SET PJT_STEP = "R2", PJT_STEP_NM = "수주보고", PJT_AMT = (SELECT IF(DDS.TAX_GUBUN = 1, SUBSTRING_INDEX((SELECT TOT_RES_COST FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_RND WHERE PJT_SN = A.PJT_SN) * 1.1, '.', 1), (SELECT TOT_RES_COST FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_RND WHERE PJT_SN = A.PJT_SN)) FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT A LEFT JOIN CAM_MNG.DJ_DEPO_SETTING DDS ON A.PJT_SN = DDS.FR_PJT_SN WHERE A.PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}) WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}
/*updRndProjectInfoRes*/ UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT SET PJT_STEP = "R3", PJT_STEP_NM = "결과보고" WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}
mapper.select: /*getReqPartRateData*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PART_RATE WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} ORDER BY PART_RATE_SN DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert:
/*insReqPartRateData*/ INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PART_RATE ( PJT_SN, JOIN_MEM_NM, JOIN_MEM_SN, MON_PAY_CRT, MIN_PART_RATE, MAX_PART_RATE, PART_ETC, PAY_BUDGET, ITEM_BUDGET, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUE ( #{pjtSn}, #{joinMemNm}, #{joinMemSn}, #{monPayCrt}, #{minPartRate}, #{maxPartRate}, #{partEtc}, #{payBudget}, #{itemBudget}, #{empSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_PJT_MNG' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_PJT_PART_RATE'
mapper.update: /*updReqPartRateData*/ UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PART_RATE SET JOIN_MEM_NM = #{joinMemNm}, JOIN_MEM_SN = #{joinMemSn}, MON_PAY_CRT = #{monPayCrt}, MIN_PART_RATE = #{minPartRate}, MAX_PART_RATE = #{maxPartRate}, PART_ETC = #{partEtc}, PAY_BUDGET = #{payBudget}, ITEM_BUDGET = #{itemBudget}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq} WHERE PART_RATE_SN = #{partRateSn}
/*setPartRateRequest*/ UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PART_RATE SET STAT = "Y", MNG_STAT = "R" WHERE PART_RATE_SN = #{partRateSn}
mapper.select: /*getReqPartRateVerList*/ SELECT B.*, A.STAT, A.PAY_BUDGET AS RT_PAY_BUDGET, A.ITEM_BUDGET AS RT_ITEM_BUDGET, A.MNG_STAT AS RT_MNG_STAT, (select part_rate_ver from cam_pjt_mng.dj_pjt_part_rate_ver where pjt_sn = #{pjtSn} and mng_stat = 'C' order by part_rate_ver_sn desc limit 1) AS VER_NUM FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PART_RATE A LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PART_RATE_VER B ON A.PART_RATE_SN = B.PART_RATE_SN WHERE A.PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}
/*getAccountInfo*/ SELECT A.* FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_ACCOUNT A WHERE A.PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}
/*getPartRateVerCount*/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PART_RATE_VER WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}
mapper.insert:
/*insReqPartRateVerData*/ INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PART_RATE_VER ( PART_RATE_SN, PJT_SN, PART_RATE_VER, JOIN_MEM_SN, JOIN_MEM_NM, MON_PAY_CRT, MIN_PART_RATE, MAX_PART_RATE, PART_ETC, PAY_BUDGET, ITEM_BUDGET, MNG_STAT, REQ_SORT, REQ_DATE, REQ_EMP_NM, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUE ( #{PART_RATE_SN}, #{PJT_SN}, #{PART_RATE_VER}, #{JOIN_MEM_SN}, #{JOIN_MEM_NM}, #{MON_PAY_CRT}, #{MIN_PART_RATE}, #{MAX_PART_RATE}, #{PART_ETC}, #{PAY_BUDGET}, #{ITEM_BUDGET}, "R", #{REQ_SORT}, NOW(), #{EMP_NAME}, #{EMP_SEQ} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_PJT_MNG' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_PJT_PART_RATE_VER'
mapper.select: /*getPartRateVerBerData*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PART_RATE_VER WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} ORDER BY PART_RATE_VER_SN DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: /*insPartRateDetBef*/ INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PART_RATE_DET ( PART_RATE_VER_SN, PJT_SN, EMP_SAL, CHNG_SAL, GUBUN, PART_DET_STR_DT, PART_DET_END_DT, PART_EMP_NM, PART_EMP_SEQ, PAY_RATE, ITEM_RATE, MON_SAL, MON_DIFF, TOT_PAY_BUDG, TOT_ITEM_BUDG, TOT_RATE, PAY_TOTAL ) (SELECT #{partRateVerSn}, PJT_SN, EMP_SAL, CHNG_SAL, GUBUN, PART_DET_STR_DT, PART_DET_END_DT, PART_EMP_NM, PART_EMP_SEQ, PAY_RATE, ITEM_RATE, MON_SAL, MON_DIFF, TOT_PAY_BUDG, TOT_ITEM_BUDG, TOT_RATE, PAY_TOTAL FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PART_RATE_DET WHERE PART_RATE_VER_SN = (SELECT PART_RATE_VER_SN FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PART_RATE_VER WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn} AND PART_RATE_VER = #{partRateCnt}))

/*insPartRateDetail*/ INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PART_RATE_DET ( PART_RATE_VER_SN, PJT_SN, EMP_SAL, CHNG_SAL, GUBUN, PART_DET_STR_DT, PART_DET_END_DT, PART_EMP_NM, PART_EMP_SEQ, PAY_RATE, ITEM_RATE, MON_SAL, MON_DIFF, TOT_PAY_BUDG, TOT_ITEM_BUDG, TOT_RATE, PAY_TOTAL ) VALUE ( #{partRateVerSn}, #{pjtSn}, #{basicSalary}, #{chngSal}, #{gubun}, #{strDt}, #{endDt}, #{partEmpName}, #{partEmpSeq}, #{payRate}, #{itemRate}, #{monSal}, #{mon}, #{totPayBudget}, #{totItemBudget}, #{totRate}, #{payTotal} )
mapper.update: UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PART_RATE_VER SET MNG_STAT = "S", REP_DATE = now() WHERE PART_RATE_VER_SN = #{partRateVerSn}

/*updReqPartRateVerToReqPartRate*/ UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PART_RATE SET JOIN_MEM_SN = (SELECT JOIN_MEM_SN FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PART_RATE_VER WHERE PART_RATE_VER_SN = #{partRateVerSn}), JOIN_MEM_NM = (SELECT JOIN_MEM_NM FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PART_RATE_VER WHERE PART_RATE_VER_SN = #{partRateVerSn}) WHERE PART_RATE_SN = (SELECT PART_RATE_SN FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PART_RATE_VER WHERE PART_RATE_VER_SN = #{partRateVerSn})
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_PS ( PJT_SN, PS_ROW, PS_PREP, PS_PREP_NM, PS_NM, PS_STR_DE, PS_END_DE, PS_EMP_SEQ, PS_EMP_NM, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{pjtSn}, '0', '0', #{psPrepNm}, 'RND', DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), #{EMP_SEQ}, #{EMP_NAME_KR}, #{regEmpSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_PJT_MNG' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_PJT_PS'
INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_CHANGE ( PJT_SN, REG_EMP_SEQ, TYPE ) VALUES ( #{pjtSn}, #{empSeq}, #{num} )
mapper.update: /* updateChangeApprStat */ UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_CHANGE SET STATUS = #{approveStatCode}, DOC_ID = #{docId} WHERE PJT_CH_SN = (SELECT MAX(PJT_CH_SN) FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_CHANGE WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn})

/* updateChangeFinalApprStat */ UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_CHANGE SET STATUS = #{approveStatCode}, APPROVAL_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), APPROVAL_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq} WHERE PJT_CH_SN = (SELECT MAX(PJT_CH_SN) FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PJT_CHANGE WHERE PJT_SN = #{pjtSn})
